destails1: - The elements such as surgery, chemotherapy, radiotherapy, the hairless period will keep the chronology and proportion from reality.
destails2: - Each artwork is original and completely hand drawn with its own color palette according to the toys, clothes, and medical items that Matti uses.
destails3: - One time collection with this story.
destails4: - The collection also has 55 very rare pieces specially designed, one for each week of cnad Matti fights this disease.
destails6: When you purchase a eHOPEwarriors NFT, the art is totally and completely yours.
destails7: - eHOPEwarriors are available as high resolution, 5,000px by 5,000px JPEGs. This allows you to print a high-quality physical copy of your NFT, display it in high res on a screen, and use it for large-scale print or display.
parText: The collection was born and is inspired by the real story that Matti goes through with this cancer.
title: The Collection

destails1: - You will be able to bid or donate your NFT to the cases presented on our platform. we encourage you to do this and in time we will develop rewards for donors.
destails2: - Perks offered by our current and future partnerships.
destails3: - Discount on the next collection inspired by children with this disease from all over the world-whitelist spot to the collections of our partners.

destails5: - As a eHOPEwarriors NFT holder, you'll be eligible for future airdrops of tokens, nfts and other prizes.
destails6: - Give back to the community through airdrops and rewards.
parText: - Satisfaction that you are involved in a community where the lives of many little cancer patients will have a different path.
